narrative:
This was a focused inspection of the male Yorkshire terrier named John (mc# 048 277 607) cited under 2.40(b)(2)
on the April 21, 2015 inspection report.  This focused inspection also included the male Chihuahua (mc# 090 066
101) and the male Yorkshire terrier (mc# 073 605 869) cited under 2.40(b)(2) on the May 27, 2014 inspection
report.  All three dogs were examined and treated by the Attending Veterinarian.  The male Chihuahua (mc# 090
066 101) and the male Yorkshire terrier (mc# 073 605 869) are no longer at the facility.
The inspection and the exit briefing were conducted with the licensee.
